website_summaries.verdict: This bag will protect your tripod against dents, dings and other damage.
pros: Asymmetrical bag makes it easy to insert a tripod without damaging its head or legs
Carrying strap is expertly constructed and helps reduce the risk of drops
Nylon construction limits rips and abrasions
cons: Zipper may malfunction or break, sometimes after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Zippers break very easily
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month after I got it, both Zippers broke after a single 2 week trip & with only occasional use. Either it’s not original Manfrotto or item was defective. Seller won’t accept returns & repair shop can’t fix it. So basically useless now.
customer_reviews.author: tarek

customer_reviews.title: A decent soft case
customer_reviews.text: I am relatively pleased with this carry bag, but wish it were just a bit longer and had a bit more padding. The case is not quite big enough for my tripod, and I have a heck of a time trying to get it in and out of the bag. The padding is not that great either, I really was expecting more for the price. To be honest I will probably end up buying a solid case which will provide the padding and protection I need for my gear, but for now this bag will do.
customer_reviews.author: Riley's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag! Worth its $$$
customer_reviews.text: I can confirm that it can fit inside itself Manfrotto 055 and XPRO 3 way head. Just right and tight! No spare room! I was worried it won't fit but several reviewers mentioned that they were able to. As usual, top notch materials and craftsmanship from Manfrotto. It has "Made in China" tag but quality is great. Very comfortable to wear on the shoulder or simply by the handle (where the feet are). It worth $55 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, fits well. Zippers don't look like they are going to last as well as the beg
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way, except for the zipper. The zipper when pulled must navigate around the "top" of the bag, and that weird path causes it to bind a bit. Hopefully it will loosen up with wear, but it doesn't inspire great confidence. Perhaps the designer wasn't aware someone was going to skimp on the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy an expensive tripod without having a protective case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tripod bag. Being Manfrotto it speaks quality. I do believe it is a little overpriced. That being said, It still has the quality and assurance that Manfrotto and Amazon provide. Please check measurements when ordering. You will find size is consistent to your model product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Soderlund

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is built with quality. It fit my manfrotto 290 tripod with the video fluid head perfectly. It looks and feels sturdy, like it was custom built for it. The only thing that would have made it perfect is perhaps a small pouch inside or outside to hold small items like the allen wrench to adjust the legs once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: pika6pak

customer_reviews.title: It fit my manfrotto 055 with fluid head perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fine accept the zippers could be tougher. They are adequate I suppose but definitely not mil spec. I guess if the zipper fails I will replace it. If the zipper was tough this bag would be great. With this zipper it's only good I guess. Zippers can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few days ago for my tripod Manfrotto 055 Aluminum 3-Section and Video Head MVH502AH. And enters tightly in the bag, not one centimeter more or one less. You just have to get the arm out of the head because otherwise it is very wide.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Presutti

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, well-made case to carry my Really Right Stuff carbon fiber tripod. As other reviewers have noted, it would be nice if had a small pocket inside it to carry perhaps the allen wrenches of the tripod, but that is not a deal breaker. The fabric and zippers are solid and overall, the bag is quality but not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: California Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable fits 055 with Head
customer_reviews.text: Padded all around with zipper line on Manfrotto red that matches your tripod. One semirigid circular area for opening. Fits 055 (4-section with 3-way head) with ample space left. Since it is made of synthetic fabrics with foam pad in between, it should resist light rain for a good amount of time reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Better then expected, my manfrotto tripod and head fit in there perfectly, now I dont have to worry about getting any scratches thru this well made well padded bag.. Deff worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag and fits the 3 section Manfotto 055 with XPRO ball head perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Good for protecting my tripod
customer_reviews.text: I have a Manfrotto carbon fiber tripod. This fits perfect and protects it while it is in the trunk of my car or in my equipment closet.
customer_reviews.author: Big Time Mood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sturdy bag that is well padded. My Manfrotto tripod fits perfectly with ball head attached. The reason I deducted a star is because it's quite expensive and for the price I paid for the tripod it should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Tito Greg

customer_reviews.title: Tripods made easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I can actually fit two tripods in this, but it’s still great for just one. I’ve already taken it along a lot more than I would have without a case.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well-padded tripod bag with an equally sturdy zipper. Encased in its new carry case, usually left inside the boot of my car, I am confident my tripod is safe and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Eos

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy for long term use
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this case at first but I’ve had it less than a year and the zipper already broke. Definitely not made for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Manfrotto upholds its name. Fits both my tripod and fluid head. Although it's a tight fit, its worth the convenience of carrying one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Duy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bag. Love the “quiver” type opening. As another stated, I hope the zipper lasts.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Tripod Bag
customer_reviews.text: Price was right and it fit my Manfrotto tripod just like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Powell

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. My Gitzo GT4543LS Systematic Series 4 Carbon Fiber Tripod with Arca Swiss Z1 ball head fits perfectly. I like the top loading. Easy to carry. Nice padding.
customer_reviews.author: Olcay Boz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does its work, I simply thought it was made of a different material.
customer_reviews.author: Abril Cambero

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: Quality bag. Carry my 055pro3 with my xpro ball head. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag!! Fits my tripod and geared head well!! Keeps them in nice shape.
customer_reviews.author: The King Of all

customer_reviews.title: Fits the MK190XPRO3-3W just fine
customer_reviews.text: This a nice padded tripod case with a reinforced area near the head and a grab handle near the foot section of the case. Fits my Manfrotto MK190XPRO3-3W tripod snug (arms retracted/ head straight). Manfrotto says MK190XPRO3-3W and this case MBAG75PN is not compatible on their website, that is incorrect in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to receive this gift. she is 21.and fits her tripod perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spreadborough

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality, fit, and performance
customer_reviews.text: This Manfrotto MBAG75PN 75cm padded bag was the perfect fit for my MT055XPRO3 055 tripod and attached MH293D3-Q2 290 Series 3 head. The padding is thick enough to give the bag support, and the extra padding at the head end provides extra protection at the most critical part. This bag has gone through many travels, including lots of trips on airport baggage carousels without any damage inside or out. If I had one wish, though, it would be for an additional handle, a small one, midway along the central axis of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tripod case. I have to detach the handle to my video head that is attached to the tripod, but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Manfrotto--MBAG75PN
customer_reviews.text: Light and compact. Great for day trips. Impressive construction. I would recommend this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: John McCown

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery, reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: Only draw back was no pocket to put papers or tool in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and quality. Love the one-piece zipper design. Perfect storage for 2 of my Manfrotto 1051 BAC Mini compact stands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Manfrotto MT055XPRO03 Aluminium tripod & Vanguard GH-100 pistol grip head.
customer_reviews.author: Steve White

customer_reviews.title: This has the cheapest zipper I've ever seen. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This has the cheapest zipper I've ever seen. I don't expect it to last a week and will be returning it. Manfrotto is usually made with quality components but they missed the mark using this zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Spring

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this tripod bag and the fact you can pull your tripod out from the top. Has nice fabric to protect your tripod from scratches and inclement weather. Have purchased another in larger size for another tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Roise

customer_reviews.title: it is a bit too big - if they made one that was half the circumference it would be a better fit. There is a lot of empty room ..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a bag for my Manfrotto case, and while this fit the bill, it is a bit too big - if they made one that was half the circumference it would be a better fit. There is a lot of empty room with my 290X tripod in there.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Needs external pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Ok bag. Didn’t want to pay $120 for a Gitzo. Protects pretty good,if it had a pocket or two external would have been a 4 star at least.
customer_reviews.author: TOW

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect with XPRO magnesium ball head
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect with XPRO magnesium ball head. But price could be cheaper. Would have gave it 5 stars. Since it really should be INCLUDED with the carbon fiber tripod MT190CXPRO4.
customer_reviews.author: hi_fidelity

customer_reviews.title: Good but verify measurements of your tripod
customer_reviews.text: Good things: Good design, quality material, good portability. Bad things: Not compatible with the MVT502AM Twin Legs and MVH502A 502 Video Head, it does not come despite being an amazon recommendation. I would have devoured it to change it but I live in Guatemala and it is more expensive to return it than to buy a new one. My mistake was not checking the measurement to see if it came with MVT502AM Twin Legs and MVH502A 502 Video Head
customer_reviews.author: Misra

product_meta.title: Manfrotto MB MBAG75PN Tripod Bag Padded 75cm (Black)
product_meta.description: Introducing our newest additions to the tripod bag line! The tripod bag range is now complete after adding 2 smaller sizes, Specifically designed to hold the latest Manfrotto tripods: 190go! and the new 290 family. Asymmetric Shape: The tripod legs fit comfortably in the narrower end and extra space is allowed for the larger volume of the head at the wider end of the bag. Ease of Use: Getting the tripod in and out of these bags is fast and easy thanks to the zipper that extends down to the full length of the bag, even where the head is stored. Comfortable Strap: They feature also a strap for a comfortable shoulder carrying. Quality: All these bags have been made with the highest quality materials: ballistic nylon that prevents the bag from abrasions and tearing, and an external coating that makes it protective and water-repellent.
feature_bullets: Specifically designed to hold the latest Manfrotto tripods: 190go! and the new 290 family.
All these bags have been made with the highest quality materials

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars224 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
